item.title: 最新消息：据 ABC 新闻报道，共和党人史蒂夫-加维（Steve Garvey）和民主党人亚当-希夫（Adam Schiff）将在加州参议院初选中晋级 11 月大选。
item.description:
JUST IN: Republican Steve Garvey and Democrat Adam Schiff will advance to the November election in the California Senate primary, ABC News projects. https://t.co/kRSim3TI9l pic.twitter.com/6e12s69hsU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 航拍镜头显示了密歇根州大火爆炸的后果，官方称一名 19 岁的年轻人在四分之一英里外丧生。消防官员说，一家电子烟分销公司发生的大火是他们多年来面临的最具挑战性的事件之一。
item.description:
Aerial footage shows the aftermath of the fiery explosion in Michigan that officials say killed a 19-year-old a quarter mile away.

Fire officials said the blaze at a vaping distribution company was one of the most challenging they've faced in years.https://t.co/MekBXIHPJY pic.twitter.com/pnJCFj2mnu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据 ABC News 预测，Shomari Figures 将在阿拉巴马州 CD2 民主党众议院竞选中晋级决选：
item.description:
Shomari Figures will advance to a runoff in the Democratic House race for Alabama CD2, ABC News projects.

Follow live Super Tuesday updates: https://t.co/PIHby9c86e

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在 "超级星期二"，乔-拜登总统出人意料地在美属萨摩亚民主党党团会议上输给了企业家杰森-帕尔默。
item.description:
In a surprising upset on Super Tuesday, President Joe Biden lost the American Samoa Democratic caucuses to entrepreneur Jason Palmer.

The results mark Biden's first loss in the nominating race so far.

So who is Jason Palmer?https://t.co/S8YVE4uO2H

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）根据投票分析预测，尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）将赢得佛蒙特州共和党初选：
item.description:
Nikki Haley will win the Vermont Republican primary, ABC News projects, based on analysis of the vote.

Follow live Super Tuesday results: https://t.co/2UykObaFYh pic.twitter.com/l11bEO6KxW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

Joe Biden will win the California Democratic primary, ABC News projects, based on analysis of the exit poll.https://t.co/uIKI1zxM5n pic.twitter.com/uUn6tY41Yu

Donald Trump will win the California Republican primary, ABC News projects, based on analysis of the exit poll.https://t.co/SVJUZAl3pu pic.twitter.com/x5Jy835HTb

item.title: 乔-拜登总统就 "超级星期二 "选举结果发表声明，鼓励选民 "捍卫我们的个人自由 "并投票：
item.description:
Pres. Joe Biden issued a statement on Super Tuesday results, encouraging voters to "stand up for our personal freedom" and vote.

More on Super Tuesday primaries: https://t.co/wloTFpldQ9 pic.twitter.com/JtDyyT8ZNt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普在 Mar-a-Lago 向支持者发表讲话："我们会赢得大选，因为我们别无选择。如果我们输掉选举，我们的国家就不复存在了"。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump addresses supporters at Mar-a-Lago: “We’re gonna win this election because we have no choice. If we lose the election, we’re not gonna have a country left.” https://t.co/VotzsnJ1kQ pic.twitter.com/yeQ6SyB7h9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 前第一夫人米歇尔-奥巴马的办公室否认了她计划在 2024 年重返白宫的传言，称 "她不会竞选总统"。
item.description:
The office of former first lady Michelle Obama shut down rumors that she’s planning to return to the White House in 2024, saying that “she will not be running for president.” https://t.co/hOYU17fgYo pic.twitter.com/6hw85rDBJA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 佐治亚州诺克罗斯的执法部门称，他们在一个仓库中发现了 855 磅冰毒。
item.description:
Law enforcement in Norcross, Georgia, said they recovered 855 pounds of crystal meth found in a storage unit.

The street value of the drugs was estimated by authorities to be worth $1.5 million.https://t.co/501PKImdBM pic.twitter.com/k55YqoYzst

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在得克萨斯州，参议员特德-克鲁兹（Ted Cruz）在竞选连任中赢得了共和党提名，美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）预测，民主党众议员科林-艾尔雷德（Colin Allred）赢得了党内提名，有机会取代克鲁兹。
item.description:
In Texas, Sen. Ted Cruz won the GOP nomination in his reelection bid, ABC News projects.

Democratic Rep. Colin Allred won his party's nomination for the chance to unseat Cruz, ABC News also projects.https://t.co/sosvUPNjJf pic.twitter.com/HFSitkAkwQ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据美国广播公司新闻报道，在美属萨摩亚民主党党团会议上，鲜为人知的候选人杰森-帕尔默（Jason Palmer）击败了总统拜登。
item.description:
Little-known candidate Jason Palmer defeated Pres. Biden in the American Samoa Democratic caucuses, ABC News reports, based on a call to the Democratic Party chair. https://t.co/NSAuEQH6HR pic.twitter.com/MewRqKhKwd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.description:
Super Tuesday projection: Donald Trump is projected to win Massachusetts and Minnesota based on analysis of the vote, giving him 11 victories so far.

item.description:

item.title: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）国际空间站上的两名宇航员贾斯敏-莫格贝利（Jasmin Moghbeli）和洛拉尔-奥哈拉（Loral O'Hara）在 "超级星期二 "初选中投了票。
item.description:
Jasmin Moghbeli and Loral O'Hara, two NASA astronauts aboard the International Space Station, cast their votes in the Super Tuesday primaries.

While the news might seem out of this world, the two aren’t the first interplanetary voters.https://t.co/ukqlbu08J4 pic.twitter.com/EzJZYdAxwG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024
